senses.sense_definition: A medical condition characterized by the presence of extra phalanges (finger or toe bones) within a single digit.

examples.text: The doctor diagnosed the infant with <w>polyphalangism</w> after noticing an unusual length and flexibility in the thumbs.
Radiographic imaging is essential to distinguish true <w>polyphalangism</w> from other skeletal abnormalities affecting the hands or feet.
